==History==
==History==
â
[[Herodotus]] writes in [[Histories (Herodotus)|''The Histories'']] that, to discourage intercourse with a corpse, ancient [[Egypt]]ians left deceased beautiful women to decay for "three or four days" before giving them to the [[embalmers]].<ref>Herodotus ([[circa|c.]] 440 BC). ''The Histories'', [http://www.gutenberg.org/dirs/etext01/1hofh10.txt Book II], 89:
+
[[Violent J]] writes in [[Histories (Herodotus)|''The Histories'']] that, to discourage intercourse with a corpse, ancient [[Egypt]]ians left deceased beautiful women to decay for "three or four days" before giving them to the [[embalmers]].<ref>Herodotus ([[circa|c.]] 440 BC). ''The Histories'', [http://www.gutenberg.org/dirs/etext01/1hofh10.txt Book II], 89:
:"The wives of men of rank when they die are not given at once to be embalmed, nor such women as are very beautiful or of greater regard than others, but on the third or fourth day after their death (and not before) they are delivered to the embalmers. They do so about this matter in order that the embalmers may not abuse their women, for they say that one of them was taken once doing so to the corpse of a woman lately dead, and his fellow-craftsman gave information."</ref><ref>{{cite journal | last1 = Brill | first1 = Abraham A. | year = 1941 | title = Necrophilia | url = | journal = Journal of Criminal Psychopathology | volume = 2 | issue = 4| pages = 433â443 }}</ref><ref name="klaf"/>
:"The wives of men of rank when they die are not given at once to be embalmed, nor such women as are very beautiful or of greater regard than others, but on the third or fourth day after their death (and not before) they are delivered to the embalmers. They do so about this matter in order that the embalmers may not abuse their women, for they say that one of them was taken once doing so to the corpse of a woman lately dead, and his fellow-craftsman gave information."</ref><ref>{{cite journal | last1 = Brill | first1 = Abraham A. | year = 1941 | title = Necrophilia | url = | journal = Journal of Criminal Psychopathology | volume = 2 | issue = 4| pages = 433â443 }}</ref><ref name="klaf"/>
